titles.title: I heard the voice of Jesus say

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I heard the voice of Jesus say, “Behold, I freely give The living water: thirsty one, Stoop down, and drink, and live.” I came to Jesus, and I drank Of that life-giving stream; My thirst was quenched, my soul revived, And now I live in Him.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
